data.name: Tom Bihn Synik 22
data.notes: Because the bag is so small, the pass-through on the back is only 7 inches wide—too narrow to slip over the handle of a carry-on. And the dense fabric and plentiful hardware—the zippers, O-rings, and buckles—make it a little heavy. But in the 22-liter size, she didn't notice the extra weight. It's the perfect, organized conference companion, but it's on the highest end of what we think is worth spending on a bag.

data.name: Rains Backpack Mini
data.notes: I am a working, grown adult, not a high schooler headed to algebra or a hiker traversing the Alps. When I leave my work-from-home bubble to venture outside, my bag should look like

data.name: Herschel Heritage Backpack
data.notes: The Tom Bihn is priced out of many budgets, but you don't have to settle for a crappy bag if you want to save money.
